column4: Microsoft meets with private equity over Yahoo deal
column5: Healdsburg  CALIFORNIA Microsoft Corp  executives are in early talks with potential Yahoo Inc  investors about contributing to financing to buy the troubled Internet company  a person familiar with the situation said.

column4: Microsoft meets with private equity over Yahoo deal
column5: Healdsburg  CALIFORNIA  March 26 Microsoft Corp  executives are in early talks with potential Yahoo Inc  investors about contributing to financing to buy the troubled Internet company  a person familiar with the situation said.

column4: Microsoft apologizes for offensive tirade by its 'chatbot'
column5: LOS ANGELES Microsoft is "deeply sorry" for the racist and sexist Twitter messages generated by the so-called chatbot it launched this week  a company official wrote on Friday  after the artificial intelligence program went on an embarrassing tirade.

column4: Microsoft apologizes for offensive tirade by its 'chatbot'
column5: LOS ANGELES  March 25 Microsoft is "deeply sorry" for the racist and sexist Twitter messages generated by the so-called chatbot it launched this week  a company official wrote on Friday  after the artificial intelligence program went on an embarrassing tirade.
